title: (x) Newsweek Magazine headers, footers and body copy - Vincent, H&FJ Knockout {Mikey D, Stephen}
content:
Hey,

Need to know what typeface Newsweek Magazine headers, footers and body copy are.

Any thoughts?

Thanks,  
Matt
author: wewert27

comments.content:
They aren’t the greatest photos, I don’t have access to a scanner at the moment. Hope they will do.

Thanks,  
Matt

Body

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090607101643im_/http:/typophile.com/files/nw_body_4215.JPG)

Footer

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090607101643im_/http:/typophile.com/files/nw_footer_4579.JPG)

Header

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090607101643im_/http:/typophile.com/files/nw_header_4624.JPG)

Matthew Carter designed Vincent (Text, Middle, Headline & Banner), for Newsweek. The style shown is the Text.

Mikey
